subject: Football
College Athletics
Assaults
lead_paragraph: Two Marshall players — cornerback DeQuan Bembry and defensive back T. J. Drakeford — were charged with misdemeanors after an incident early Sunday outside a bar in Huntington, W.Va.
snippet: Two Marshall players — cornerback DeQuan Bembry and defensive back T. J. Drakeford — were charged with misdemeanors after an incident early Sunday outside a bar in Huntington, W.Va.
